#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main () {
	int tc;
	scanf("%d",&tc);
	while (tc--) {
		string s;
		cin >> s;
		int ans = 0;
		for (int i=0; i<s.size(); i++) {
			if (i%7==6) {
				continue;
			}
			else if (s[i]=='M')
				ans = ans + 3;
			else
				ans = ans + 4;
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
